OptionPositionProfit

class OptionPositionProfit(st: int, k: int, premium: int, qty: int = 1)[source]#

Calculate option position profit.

Parameters:

  • st – int, underlying asset price at time of t

  • k – int, strike price

  • premium – int, premium

  • qty – int, quantity

Calculate long call position profit.

int

class AssetPositionProfit(price: int, st: int, qty: int = 1)[source]#

Calculate asset position profit.

Parameters:

  • price – int, asset price at time of 0

  • st – int, asset price at time of t

  • qty – int, quantity
